bug.author: IronPan
bug.summary: View all pipeline runs pointing to archive page
bug.description:
The view all pipeline runs link in the central dashboard points to the archive page
kubeflow/components/centraldashboard/public/components/dashboard-view.js
Line 91 in 67ea669
text: 'View all pipeline runs',
This should instead link to the page that list all the runs. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2348602/60847486-a1e84c00-a197-11e9-81cf-030bbd93713e.png></denchmark-link>
